jellyfin.name: Jellyfin
jellyfin.description: Servidor multimedia gratuito y open source. Alternativa a Plex.
jellyfin.compose:
services:
  jellyfin:
    image: jellyfin/jellyfin:latest
    container_name: jellyfin
    ports:
      - '8096:8096'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/cache:/cache
    environment:
      - JELLYFIN_PublishedServerUrl=${HOST_IP}
    restart: unless-stopped

plex.name: Plex
plex.description: Servidor multimedia con apps para todas las plataformas.
plex.compose:
services:
  plex:
    image: plexinc/pms-docker:latest
    container_name: plex
    ports:
      - '32400:32400'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/transcode:/transcode
    environment:
      - PLEX_CLAIM=${PLEX_CLAIM}
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

emby.name: Emby
emby.compose:
services:
  emby:
    image: emby/embyserver:latest
    container_name: emby
    ports:
      - '8920:8096'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
    environment:
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

navidrome.name: Navidrome
navidrome.description: Servidor de música compatible con Subsonic/Airsonic.
navidrome.compose:
services:
  navidrome:
    image: deluan/navidrome:latest
    container_name: navidrome
    ports:
      - '4533:4533'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/data
      - ${MUSIC_PATH}:/music:ro
    environment:
      - ND_SCANSCHEDULE=1h
      - ND_LOGLEVEL=info
    restart: unless-stopped

nextcloud.name: Nextcloud
nextcloud.description: Tu propia nube privada. Archivos, calendario, contactos.
nextcloud.compose:
services:
  nextcloud:
    image: nextcloud:latest
    container_name: nextcloud
    ports:
      - '8080:80'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/html:/var/www/html
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/var/www/html/data
    environment:
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

syncthing.name: Syncthing
syncthing.description: Sincronización de archivos P2P, sin servidor central.
syncthing.compose:
services:
  syncthing:
    image: syncthing/syncthing:latest
    container_name: syncthing
    hostname: nimbusos
    ports:
      - '8384:8384'
      - '22000:22000/tcp'
      - '22000:22000/udp'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}:/var/syncthing
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
    restart: unless-stopped

filebrowser.name: File Browser
filebrowser.description: Explorador de archivos web con interfaz moderna.
filebrowser.compose:
services:
  filebrowser:
    image: filebrowser/filebrowser:latest
    container_name: filebrowser
    ports:
      - '8085:80'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/database.db:/database.db
      - ${DATA_PATH}:/srv
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
    restart: unless-stopped

immich.name: Immich
immich.description: Gestión de fotos y vídeos con IA. Alternativa a Google Photos.

transmission.name: Transmission
transmission.description: Cliente BitTorrent ligero con interfaz web.
transmission.compose:
services:
  transmission:
    image: linuxserver/transmission:latest
    container_name: transmission
    ports:
      - '9091:9091'
      - '51413:51413'
      - '51413:51413/udp'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${DOWNLOADS_PATH}:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

qbittorrent.name: qBittorrent
qbittorrent.description: Cliente BitTorrent potente con muchas opciones.
qbittorrent.compose:
services:
  qbittorrent:
    image: linuxserver/qbittorrent:latest
    container_name: qbittorrent
    ports:
      - '8081:8081'
      - '6881:6881'
      - '6881:6881/udp'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${DOWNLOADS_PATH}:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=${TZ}
      - WEBUI_PORT=8081
    restart: unless-stopped

sonarr.name: Sonarr
sonarr.description: Gestión automática de series de TV.
sonarr.compose:
services:
  sonarr:
    image: linuxserver/sonarr:latest
    container_name: sonarr
    ports:
      - '8989:8989'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${MEDIA_PATH}/tv:/tv
      - ${DOWNLOADS_PATH}:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

radarr.name: Radarr
radarr.compose:
services:
  radarr:
    image: linuxserver/radarr:latest
    container_name: radarr
    ports:
      - '7878:7878'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${MEDIA_PATH}/movies:/movies
      - ${DOWNLOADS_PATH}:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

prowlarr.name: Prowlarr
prowlarr.compose:
services:
  prowlarr:
    image: linuxserver/prowlarr:latest
    container_name: prowlarr
    ports:
      - '9696:9696'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

homeassistant.name: Home Assistant
homeassistant.description: Automatización del hogar. Controla todos tus dispositivos IoT.
homeassistant.compose:
services:
  homeassistant:
    image: homeassistant/home-assistant:latest
    container_name: homeassistant
    network_mode: host
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
    environment:
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

pihole.name: Pi-hole
pihole.description: Bloqueo de publicidad a nivel de red DNS.
pihole.compose:
services:
  pihole:
    image: pihole/pihole:latest
    container_name: pihole
    ports:
      - '53:53/tcp'
      - '53:53/udp'
      - '8088:80'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/etc-pihole:/etc/pihole
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/etc-dnsmasq.d:/etc/dnsmasq.d
    environment:
      - TZ=${TZ}
      - WEBPASSWORD=${WEBPASSWORD}
    restart: unless-stopped

adguard.name: AdGuard Home
adguard.description: Bloqueo de publicidad y tracking DNS.
adguard.compose:
services:
  adguard:
    image: adguard/adguardhome:latest
    container_name: adguard
    ports:
      - '53:53/tcp'
      - '53:53/udp'
      - '3000:3000'
      - '8083:80'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/work:/opt/adguardhome/work
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/conf:/opt/adguardhome/conf
    restart: unless-stopped

nginx-proxy.name: Nginx Proxy Manager
nginx-proxy.compose:
services:
  nginx-proxy:
    image: jc21/nginx-proxy-manager:latest
    container_name: nginx-proxy
    ports:
      - '80:80'
      - '81:81'
      - '443:443'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/data
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/letsencrypt:/etc/letsencrypt
    restart: unless-stopped

gitea.name: Gitea
gitea.description: Servidor Git auto-hospedado, ligero y rápido.
gitea.compose:
services:
  gitea:
    image: gitea/gitea:latest
    container_name: gitea
    ports:
      - '3000:3000'
      - '2222:22'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/data
      - /etc/timezone:/etc/timezone:ro
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
    environment:
      - USER_UID=1000
      - USER_GID=1000
    restart: unless-stopped

codeserver.name: VS Code Server
codeserver.description: Visual Studio Code en el navegador. Contraseña por defecto: nimbus
codeserver.compose:
services:
  codeserver:
    image: linuxserver/code-server:latest
    container_name: codeserver
    ports:
      - '8443:8443'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
      - ${PROJECTS_PATH}:/projects
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=${TZ}
      - PASSWORD=${PASSWORD}
    restart: unless-stopped

portainer.name: Portainer
portainer.description: Gestión visual de Docker y contenedores.
portainer.compose:
services:
  portainer:
    image: portainer/portainer-ce:latest
    container_name: portainer
    ports:
      - '9000:9000'
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped

vaultwarden.name: Vaultwarden
vaultwarden.description: Gestor de contraseñas compatible con Bitwarden.
vaultwarden.compose:
services:
  vaultwarden:
    image: vaultwarden/server:latest
    container_name: vaultwarden
    ports:
      - '8082:80'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/data
    environment:
      - WEBSOCKET_ENABLED=true
    restart: unless-stopped

authelia.name: Authelia
authelia.compose:
services:
  authelia:
    image: authelia/authelia:latest
    container_name: authelia
    ports:
      - '9092:9091'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/config
    environment:
      - TZ=${TZ}
    restart: unless-stopped

grafana.name: Grafana
grafana.compose:
services:
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    container_name: grafana
    ports:
      - '3001:3000'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/var/lib/grafana
    environment:
      - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${ADMIN_PASSWORD}
    restart: unless-stopped

prometheus.name: Prometheus
prometheus.compose:
services:
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    container_name: prometheus
    ports:
      - '9090:9090'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/config:/etc/prometheus
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/prometheus
    restart: unless-stopped

uptime-kuma.name: Uptime Kuma
uptime-kuma.description: Monitor de uptime con interfaz moderna.
uptime-kuma.compose:
services:
  uptime-kuma:
    image: louislam/uptime-kuma:latest
    container_name: uptime-kuma
    ports:
      - '3002:3001'
    volumes:
      - ${CONFIG_PATH}/data:/app/data
    restart: unless-stopped
